name: Zenith Verti-Lift Elevation/Hylo Model 275
descr:
This deluxe Zenith VertiLift Elevating HYLO table incorporates TERMINAL POINT CERVICAL, DORSAL and PELVIC DROPS to provide value with versatility for a wide range of techniques.

One of our MOST POPULAR Zenith Tables, because it´s a workhorse.

Features:

5 Year Limited Parts Warranty
Tilt Headpiece
Universal Headraiser raises or tilts
Forward Motion Headpiece w/ lo-force drop mechanism
Face Paper Toweling and Dispenser
Soft Hinged Dorsal
Swingaway Abdominal- Single Tension
Slide & Crank Pelvic
Terminal Point Pelvic Drop w/ lo-force drop mechanism
Adjustable Front Section
Adjustable Ankle Rest Cushion
Dual footswitches for easy access up, down, and stop
Also front mounted up, down, an stop switches
Sensation Upholstery in a variety of colors
Base colors available in many coordinating colors
Table Length 89”
Table Height 24”-30"
Table Width 24”
Cushion Width 18”
Table Weight 525 lbs. depending on options
